task.title: How to Configure Microsoft SQL Server Data Source Drivers

p.note: Available in the Enterprise edition only.

context.p: To configure a data source for connecting to a Microsoft SQL server, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download the appropriate MS SQL JDBC driver from the Microsoft website: .

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a data source is opened.

fig.title: Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box
Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box

step.cmd: Select SQLServer in the driver Type drop-down menu.
Click the Add Files button and select the Microsoft SQL Server driver file that you downloaded.
step.info: The SQL Server driver file is called sqljdbc.jar.

step.cmd: Continue on to configure your Microsoft SQL Server connection.
